product_name: Pearl Izumi Infinity LD Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed to boost comfort during long-distance runs, the men's Pearl Izumi Infinity LD Shorts include a fast-drying liner brief, external pockets and a modest inseam. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying outer shorts provide lightweight comfort; UPF rating of 50+ sun protection. Liner shorts blend standard polyester with Minerale(TM) polyester to increase dry time and reduce odors. Minerale fabric embeds crushed volcanic minerals in the polyester fibers for excellent wicking, evaporative cooling and odor resistance. Simply wash the shorts to renew their performance qualities; Minerale technology will not wash off or wear out. Elastic waistband with drawcord secures fit. 2 rip-and-stick pockets and 2 zippered pockets store accessories such as energy food, keys and ID. Semifitted Pearl Izumi Infinity LD shorts are not too tight and not too loose. Closeout.
